original_title: Four dead in fatal motor accident
original_body_lines: A fatal motor accident had taken place in Thambuttegama, resulting in the deaths of four people.
Sri Lanka Police said that the accident involved a car and a truck.
Four other people were injured in the fatal crash and were rushed to hospital.
